name: Dave and Kristyn Morgan
description: Dave is a practicing forensic psychologist, and Kristyn is an online influencer. They enjoy spending time with their grandkids and attending BYU sports events.

name: Jordan and Contessa Morgan
description: Jordan is a Security Engineer at Shopify, and Contessa is a stay-at-home mom.

name: Carter and Lydia Morgan
description: Carter is a SoftWare Engineer at Shopify, and Lydia is an accountant, but spends lots of her time taking care of their four boys.

name: Mckay Morgan
description: Mckay is currently studying at the University of Louisville in counseling psychology, and works in a hospital clinic. He misses Harambe.

name: Davis and Cassidy Morgan
description: Davis is currently studying at Western Governer's University in marketing, and works as a youth mentor. Cassidy is working as a Pharmacy Tech. They have birbs.

name: Parker and Shelby Morgan
description: Parker is currently studying Software Engineering at BYU-Idaho and is a Team Lead at the Factuly Technology Center, and Shelby is a Paralegal at a law firm in Rexburg. Shelby enjoys embroidering, and Parker enjoys working on his web design projects.

name: Kennedy Morgan
description: Kennedy is currently studying at BYU in Provo, and just recently returned home from her mission in Las Vegas, Nevada.
